name: Rex Nebular and the Cosmic Gender-Bender
name_original: Rex Nebular and the Cosmic Gender-Bender
description:
Rex Nebular and the Cosmic Gender-Bender is an adventure game developed by MPS Labs. It came out on 01-01-1992. MicroProse published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Rex Nebular and the Cosmic Gender-Bender is available on PC.
